title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5! With more than 20 color variants to choose from, this stand mixer is not only a stylish addition to your kitchen, but also a powerful tool for all your baking needs. 
With a capacity to make 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, this mixer is perfect for large baking projects. The 59 touch points planetary mixing ensures thorough and even mixing every time. 
Included with the mixer are a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield, making it a complete and versatile tool for all your baking needs. 
The durable metal construction and tilt-head design make it both sturdy and easy to use. With 10 different speeds and over 10 optional attachments (sold separately), the possibilities are endless with the KitchenAid 5. Don't miss out on this powerful and stylish addition to your kitchen!

Introducing the KitchedAid 5, the ultimate stand mixer for all your baking needs. With more than 20 color variants to choose from, this mixer is as stylish as it is functional. It boasts a capacity of 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, making it perfect for large baking projects. The 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and efficient mixing every time. 

Included with the mixer are a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield, all made of durable metal construction. The comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe bowl make for easy and convenient use and cleaning. With 10 speed settings and over 10 optional hub-powered attachments (sold separately), the KitchedAid 5 offers unmatched versatility and functionality. Upgrade your baking game with the KitchedAid 5 stand mixer today!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5, the ultimate stand mixer for all your baking and mixing needs! With more than 20 color variants to choose from, you can find the perfect match for your kitchen decor. This powerful mixer has a capacity of 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, making it perfect for large gatherings or baking sessions. The 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and consistent mixing every time. 

The KitchenAid 5 comes with a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield, making it a versatile and essential addition to your kitchen. The durable metal construction and tilt-head design add to its functionality and ease of use. With 10 speeds and over 10 optional attachments (sold separately), this mixer offers endless possibilities for your culinary adventures. Don't miss out on the KitchenAid 5 - the perfect choice for every home baker!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 stand mixer! With more than 20 color variants to choose from, this durable metal construction mixer is a must-have for any kitchen. The 5-quart stainless steel bowl can handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. The 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and consistent results every time. The tilt-head design and 10 speed settings make it easy to use, and it comes with essential attachments like a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield. Plus, with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), the possibilities are endless. Upgrade your baking game with the KitchenAid 5 stand mixer!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the ultimate kitchen essential with more than 20 color variants to match your style. With a capacity to make 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, this mixer is a game-changer. The 59 touch points planetary mixing action ensures thorough and consistent mixing every time. It comes with a durable metal construction and a 5-quart stainless steel bowl with a comfortable handle that is dishwasher safe. The tilt-head design allows for easy access to the bowl and the 10-speed settings give you precise control over your mixing. Plus, it includes essential attachments like the Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. With over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), the possibilities are endless. Upgrade your kitchen with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer and take your baking to the next level!
